articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Migok Co-op Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Migok Co-op Farm
						
Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon.
					 He first looked round several places of the farm including a mechanized workteam to learn in detail about this year's farming.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that all the party members and other working people of the farm made thorough preparations for this year's farming from its beginning and waged a tenacious drive, highly conscious of being responsible for the supply of rice to the nation, and thus reaped the richest-ever harvest.
					
					 He then visited ex-officer Ri Yong Jun's family in the "apricot village," which moved to a new house, to learn in detail about the construction of new modern dwelling houses and the living of farmers there.
					
					 He then moved on to the Migok Shop in the center of the village to acquaint himself with the supply of goods to the farmers.
					
					 He indicated the orientation and ways to improve the supply of goods in the rural areas.
					
					 He then mounted a platform to enjoy a bird's-eye view of the farm.
					
					 The rich autumn scenery in the fields of the co-operative farm visited by bumper crops is something spectacular which can be seen in our socialist countryside under the collective economy system only, he noted, adding that this stirring reality clearly proves the great vitality of the most advantageous socialist rural economic system in our country.
					
					 What is most important for solving the problem of clothing, food and housing is to increase agricultural production, he pointed out, indicating important tasks to be fulfilled by the farm.
					
					 He specified tasks and ways for sprucing up farm villages to meet the need of socialism, saying that rural construction is an honorable and praiseworthy patriotic work to turn the nation's rural areas into modern socialist ones better to live.
					
					 He underscored the need for the whole country and all the people to keep directing all efforts to farming and thus make steady leaping progress in agricultural production as agriculture is the most important field for solving the people's problem of clothing, food and housing. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Chief Secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the WPK Choe Ryong Hae, Secretary of the WPK Central Committee Kim Ki Nam, and Department Directors of the WPK Central Committee Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Visits Newly-Built North Hwanghae Provincial Art Theatre and Enjoys Art Performance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Visits Newly-Built North Hwanghae Provincial Art Theater and Enjoys Art Performance
Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il looked round the newly-built North Hwanghae Provincial Art Theater and watched an inaugural art performance given by the provincial art troupe.
					 He first went round the newly-built North Hwanghae Provincial Art Theater.
					
					 He looked round the interior and exterior of the theater built in grand modern style to acquaint himself in detail with its construction.
					
					 After learning about details of the theater ranging from the architectural style and contents of the theater to its decoration, facilities and acoustics, he said that the theater not only has a good inner structure and has been constructed at a high level but is impeccable in contents and style as a palace of culture and art. He highly appreciated the feats performed by the builders in successfully building such a modern theater. 
					
					 Then he watched an inaugural art performance given by the provincial art troupe at the theater.
					
					 The artistes put on the stage mixed duet and chorus "Fortune of Korea", female solo "It Is Spring Scenery and Sun Rays", dance "Pongsan Mask Dance", male solo "Believe in Future", chorus "Let's Dash ahead Like the Wind towards a Thriving Nation" and other colorful numbers. 
					
					 As the art performance was over, Kim Jong Il waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience and congratulated the artistes on their successful performance.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that all the artistes of the art troupe would conduct dynamic revolutionary performing activities in the future, too to powerfully encourage the working people in the province to wage a fresh drive and perform feats. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, chief secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the WPK, and Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, and Jang Song Thaek and Pak Nam Gi, department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Greetings to Ugandan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Ugandan President
Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greetings to Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, President of Uganda, on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of its independence.
					Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop in the future, too, Kim in the message wished the President good health and happiness and the Ugandan people prosperity.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Palestinian Leader
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Palestinian Leader
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and a gift from Mahmoud Abbas, chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on the occasion of the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The basket and gift were handed to an official concerned by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, on Thursday.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Military Attaches Corps 
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket and letter were handed to an official concerned by Russian Military Attache Aleksei Bartusov on behalf of the corps on Thursday.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory letter from the economic and commercial councilors corps here on the occasion of the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The letter was handed to an official concerned by Wang Zhilin, economic and commercial councilor of the Chinese embassy who is doyen of the corps, on Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Il from Japan
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Il from Japan
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with floral baskets by Seisuke Mihara, representative of the Okayama Prefectural Society for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship, Kiyomi Shinohara, advisor to the Tokushima Prefectural Citizens' Forum for Japan-Korea Friendship, and Koichi Honda, director of the above-said forum, separately on Thursday on the occasion of the 64th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Visits Party Founding Museum
articles.content:
Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Visits Party Founding Museum
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here visited the Party Founding Museum on Thursday on the occasion of the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The guests went round the historic mementoes and relics, being briefed on the fact that President Kim Il Sung founded the party right after the liberation of the country on the basis of the firm organizational and ideological foundations and the glorious traditions for party founding he provided in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and developed it into a revolutionary and mass party with its roots struck deep among the broad popular masses.
					
					 At the end of the visit, Wang Zhilin, Chinese economic and commercial councilor who is doyen of the corps, wrote in the visitor's book that he extends warm congratulations to the Korean people on the said occasion and hopes that they would continue to make a victorious advance under the wise leadership of the WPK.

articles.title: Members of AINDF Mission Visit Korean Revolution Museum
articles.content:
Members of AINDF Mission Visit Korean Revolution Museum
Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, and staff members of the mission visited the Korean Revolution Museum on Thursday on the occasion of the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They went round historic relics and mementoes, being briefed on the fact that President Kim Il Sung founded the WPK after the liberation of the country on the basis of the precious traditions established by him in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and made an undying contribution to its development.
					
					 At the end of the visit, Jo paid high tribute to Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He said that rosy is the future of the Korean nation thanks to Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the WPK, who has ushered in a new era of the prosperity and independent reunification of the country with his unique Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 He stressed that the vanguard fighters of the AINDF and patriotic people would wage a more dynamic struggle to bring earlier the national reunification under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: Art Performance Given on Birthday of WPK
articles.content:
Art Performance Given on Birthday of WPK
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the workers' art squad of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea at the Central Hall of Workers on Thursday to celebrate the 64th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					  Put on the stage were female chorus "It Is October", dialogic poem "Great Mother", female duet "With a Single Heart", male solo "O, Mother Party", female solo "I Don't Know Anyone but You", male quartet "Hold High the Flag of the 'DIU'" and other colorful numbers. 
					
					 The performers loudly sang of the exploits President Kim Il Sung, the founder and builder of the WPK, a Juche-type party, and General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has developed the WPK into an invincible and powerful guide of the Songun revolution.
					
					 Their presentation stressed that the people in the country of Songun enjoy happiness under wise leadership of the veteran and tested WPK.

articles.title: National Exhibition of Achievements in Public Health Held
articles.content:
National Exhibition of Achievements in Public Health Held
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The 12th national exhibition of scientific and technological achievements in the field of public health was held here from Oct. 1 to 8.
					 The exhibition brought together officials, scientists and technicians of health institutions from different parts of the country.
					
					 On display there were books helpful to the development of the nation's medical science and technology and more than 2,000 valuable inventions and new technological achievements.
					
					 The book on the preventive treatment of hepatopathy and papers of great value in prevention and diagnosis, including the paper dealing with research into the aftereffect of sandy dust on the respiratory system, were appreciated by the participants.
					
					 A variety of new medical appliances and materials were also on display.
					
					 While the exhibition was under way, its participants exchanged achievements and experience gained in the field of medical science and technology.
					
					 Its closing ceremony took place at the Three-Revolution Exhibition on Thursday.

articles.title: National Symposium on Standardization Held
articles.content:
National Symposium on Standardization Held
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- A national symposium on standardization took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday and Thursday.
					 Present there were officials of the DPRK Standardization Commission, ministries and national institutions, scientific research and educational institutions and the representative of the International Organization for Standardization. 
					
					 Opening addresses were made by Choe Tae Yong, secretary general of the DPRK Standardization Commission, and Reinhard Weissinger, representative of the International Organization for Standardization.  
					
					 The speakers said that the symposium would provide an opportunity to get broad understanding and knowledge of the global trend in the field of standardization for protecting ecological environment, promoting people's health and ensuring the security of their life and establishing a system for preserving and managing information and achievements and experience gained in this field. 
					
					 The symposium heard speeches made on the subjects "On standardization in the DPRK",  "On the system for environment preservation" and  "On the system for preserving and managing information," etc.

articles.title: Preview of Feature Film "Lifeline" Held
articles.content:
Preview of Feature Film "Lifeline" Held
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- A feature film "Lifeline" was produced by the Korean Film Studio recently. 
					 The film impressively tells the story that the workers and technicians of the Kangson Steel Complex built an UHP electric arc furnace, the highest sophistication of modern metallurgical industry, by displaying the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and persevering will to live up to the profound trust of the party and the leader.
					
					 A preview of the film was held at the Taedongmun Cinema Thursday.
					
					 It was watched by senior party and state officials, the chairpersons of friendly parties, officials of ministries and national institutions and working people in the city.

articles.title: Signal Achievements Registered in Literature and Art of Juche
articles.content:
Signal Achievements Registered in Literature and Art of Juche
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Phenomenal achievements have been made in the fields of film, drama and opera of the DPRK, demonstrating the might of the developing literature and art of Juche.
					 The feature film "The Country I Saw" (Parts 2 and 3) was produced in a peculiar Korean way in its ideological content, artistic quality and creative method and style.
					
					 The film gives an answer to a fundamental question arising in shaping the destiny of a nation by showing through a high artistic depiction that the dignity and might of a country and a nation are guaranteed by the unexcelled courage and pluck of the leader representing the sovereignty of the nation, not by the size of territory and population, and that the spirit of independence is precisely victory.
					
					 The feature film "White Birch of Paektu" is based on a real story about a girl who, after graduating from Kim Il Sung University, volunteers for a lecturer in a revolutionary battle site in the area of Mt. Paektu far from Pyongyang and devotes herself to glorifying the priceless revolutionary traditions of the Workers' Party of Korea. The film is conducive to arming all the soldiers and people with the spirit of devotedly defending the leader.
					
					 The feature film "Shipwreck" depicts on a vivid artistic canvas the fact that the imperialists' plot is doomed to shipwreck by the struggle of the Korean people to firmly protect the socialist system. It made a contribution to adding luster to the heyday of the Juche-oriented film art.
					
					 The State Theatrical Troupe recreated the drama "A Sentry under a Neon Lamp" as a masterpiece with the high ideological content, cognitive and educative effect and artistic skill, which had been created and performed in China in the early period of the 1960s.
					
					 The famous classical novel of China "The Dream of the Red Chamber" had been adapted for an opera and performed in the 1960s. The Phibada Opera Troupe successfully recreated the opera by polishing all the factors of depiction on a high artistic level and preserving its original content.
					
					 The music skit "My Dear One Has Become Hero" created by the Kangwon Provincial Art Troupe vividly depicts the struggle of women in Kumgang village who turned out to assist the front during the past Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The art pieces give a great encouragement to the soldiers and people of Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Assassination of Empress Min in 1895
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Assassination of Empress Min in 1895
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday runs a signed article denouncing the brigandish Japanese imperialists for having mounted an armed attack on the Royal Palace of the feudal state of Ri Dynasty and mercilessly killed Empress Min, the wife of Kojong, the 26th king of it, on October 8, 1895. 
					 The article says: This incident is called "Ulmi Incident" as it took place in the year of Ulmi (1895), the year of the Ram. This criminal incident clearly proves in the eyes of the world that the Japanese imperialists are the sworn enemy of the Korean people and brutal man-killers who defy international law, ethics and morality.
					
					 Citing facts to prove that the assassination of Empress Min was perpetrated by the Japanese imperialists under a premeditated scenario, pursuant to their policy of aggression towards Korea to all intents and purposes, the article goes on:
					
					 Human butchers of the Japanese imperialists broke into the bedroom of Empress Min in the Royal Palace, the most sacred icon of a sovereign state, and savagely killed her, one of the representatives of the then state sovereignty of Korea. This was the most unpardonable illegal act against humanity in history and the most hideous crime against the Korean nation and its state as it was an organized brigandish infringement upon its sovereignty and dignity. 
					
					 More than a century has passed since the "Ulmi Incident". However, the Japanese reactionaries are foolish enough to try to keep the truth behind the incident buried into oblivion forever. 
					
					 With nothing can the Japanese imperialists hide the criminal assassination of Empress Min. 
					
					 The desperate efforts on the part of Japan to distort the blood-stained history of Korean aggression and evade the responsibility for the crimes committed in the past would only touch off bitterer hatred for Japan among the Korean people. 
					
					 Japan would be well advised to properly understand the Korean people's bitterness towards Japan and their spirit of national independence.
					
					 They will certainly force Japan to pay for the past crimes it committed against the Korean nation century after century.

articles.title: Lao Figures on Relations between DPRK and Laos
articles.content:
Lao Figures on Relations between DPRK and Laos
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Bunnhang Vorachith, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and permanent secretary of the Secretariat of its Central Committee and vice-president of Laos, on Monday met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea on a visit to Laos.
					 Bunnhang Vorachith noted that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and the two countries provided by Kaysone Phomvihane and President Kim Il Sung have developed on the basis of a solid foundation. These relations are steadily developing under the deep care of General Secretary Choummaly Saynasone and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, he said.
					
					 He expressed thanks to the party, the government and the people of the DPRK for having extended support and assistance to the party, the government and the people of Laos in the period of the anti-U.S. salvation struggle and in the period of socialist construction.
					
					 He expressed belief that the cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop in the struggle for the defence of socialism and against the imperialists' "strategy of peaceful transition".
					
					 Thongloun Sisoulth, member of the Political Bureau of the LPRP Central Committee and chairman of its Commission for External Affairs who doubles as vice-prime minister and foreign minister of Laos, met the delegation of the WPK on the same day. 
					
					 He said that the long-standing friendship between the two countries with a long history is developing through support and cooperation with each other despite the complicated international situation.
					
					  The struggle of the WPK and the Korean people to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung, is sure to be crowned with victory, he added.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Friendship organizations of Finland and Norway issued statements supporting the Korean people's cause of national reunification on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.
					 The Finland-Korea Society in its statement on Oct. 1 said that the October 4 declaration is a very important declaration adopted through the reunification movement of the Korean people as it is a programme for the implementation of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					
					 It further said:
					
					 We express full support for the declaration and extend invariable solidarity to the Korean people, sincerely wishing them great successes in their efforts to accomplish the sacred cause of achieving the national unity and prosperity under the leadership of Kim Jong Il true to the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung for national reunification.
					
					 We strongly demand that the U.S. withdraw its aggressor forces from south Korea without delay and let the Korean people achieve the reunification of the country through their concerted efforts in the idea of "By our nation itself." 
					
					 The Norway-Korea Friendship Society in its statement on Oct. 3 said that the October 4 declaration was warmly welcomed by all the Korean people and the progressive humankind as soon as it was published and a new phase of detente was opened on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Meanwhile, an Indonesian public figure issued a statement on Oct. 2 in which he extended full support and encouragement to the Korean people's just cause of achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the uplifted banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Important Days of WPK Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Important Days of WPK Observed in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- A meeting and a celebration performance took place in Mongolia and seminars in Egypt and Ethiopia from Sept. 24 to 30 on the occasions of the 64th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 83rd anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 The chairman of the Mongolia-Korea Friendship Society said at the meeting that the WPK has taken deep care of the people's living while putting the interests of the people above anything else as the party representing the interests of the working people.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il has wisely led the work for the prosperity of the country, he noted.
					
					 The chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said at a seminar that Kim Jong Il has augmented the militancy and might of the WPK in every way, developing it into an invincible party. The WPK led by Kim Jong Il will powerfully demonstrate its might as a force steering the cause of Songun in the future, too, he added.
					
					 The chairman of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, the chief of its branch in Addis Ababa and other speakers at a seminar said that the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and enriched and developed by Kim Jong Il is the guiding idea to be followed by everyone and the WPK has achieved great successes as it has led the Korean people to victory, guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Mongolia.

articles.title: Revolutionary Party of Juche Founded in Unique Way
articles.content:
Revolutionary Party of Juche Founded in Unique Way
Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The cause of founding the Workers' Party of Korea was accomplished by President Kim Il Sung in an original way.
					 Basing himself on the success and experience made in party building during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, the President saw to it that party organizations were established in different local areas immediately after the liberation of the country and the Central Organizing Committee of the Communist Party of North Korea was instituted on October 10, Juche 34 (1945).
					
					 It was a historical landmark in developing Korean revolution.
					
					 The President embarked on the road of the revolution, shouldering the destiny of the country and nation in the dark period of the Japanese imperialist colonial rule. He formulated a plan to set up a revolutionary vanguard organization for the anti-Japanese national liberation struggle and formed the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) in October 1926.
					
					 The formation of the DIU marked the starting point for founding a Juche-oriented revolutionary party in a unique way. Its programme was the basis of the programme of the WPK, its principle was that of the Party construction and activities and the revolutionaries of the new generation brought up by the DIU became the backbone of the Party foundation.
					
					 The President indicated a unique way for the foundation of the revolutionary Party, putting forward the Juche-motivated line of the Korean revolution at the Kalun meeting in June 1930.
					
					 The President said at the meeting that they should found a new revolutionary party by themselves without fail and that basic party organizations should be formed first and then the party be founded by the method of expanding and strengthening them constantly and the preparatory work for its foundation done in close combination with the anti-Japanese struggle.
					
					 The President formed in early July 1930 the Society for Rallying Comrades, the first party organization, which was the origin of the WPK, and expanded it.
					
					 As a result, the party organization was formed with members of the revolutionary organizations in the area of Onsong in early October of 1930 and many basic party organizations came into being within armed ranks and in the area of East Manchuria nearby the River Tuman and in the northern border area in a short span of time.
					
					 Right after reorganizing the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army into the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) in March 1934, the President took measures of instituting the party committee of the KPRA so as to control and guide local party organizations as well as the party organizations of all levels in the army units.
					
					 Therefore, party organizations were formed in the units of the KPRA and the vast areas inside and outside the country and linked with the headquarters of the Korean revolution in an organizational way, with the result that the party's leadership over the overall Korean revolution was realized with success.
					
					 Indeed, the accomplishment of the cause of founding the Juche-oriented revolutionary Party in a unique way will shine long as a great feat performed by the President for the first time in the history.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores y presente de Mahmoud Abbas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores y presente de Mahmoud Abbas
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio el cesto de flores y presente que le dedicara el jefe de la Autoridad Nacional de Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas, en ocasion del 64o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					El embajador palestino acreditado en Corea, Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, los entrego el dia 8 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores y carta de agregados militares
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores y carta de agregados militares
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio el cesto de flores y la carta de felicitacion que le dedicara el Cuerpo de Agregados Militares acreditados en Corea en ocasion del 64o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (10 de octubre).
					En representacion del citado Cuerpo, el agregado militar de la Embajada de la Federacion Rusa, Alexey Bartusov, los entrego este jueves a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion artistica de FGSC por aniversario 64 del PTC
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion artistica de FGSC por aniversario 64 del PTC
Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en la Casa Central de Obreros la funcion del grupo artistico de propaganda de obreros del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC) en homenaje al 64o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					  En la ocasion se presentaron variadas piezas como el coro femenino "Estamos en octubre", el poema en dialogo "Gran madre", el duo femenino "Una sola voluntad", el solo masculino "Oh, Partido madre", el solo femenino "Partido es mi mejor patron", el cuarteto masculino "Levantemos en alto la bandera de la 'UDI'".
					
					Los ejecutantes elogiaron apasionadamente las hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung, quien fundo y construyo el PTC, partido del tipo Juche, y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien convirtio esta agrupacion politica en la invencible y poderosa orientadora de la revolucion del Songun.
					
					Igualmente, interpretaron en tono patetico las canciones que muestran el presente de la patria del Songun, donde se fomenta la felicidad del pueblo gracias a la sabia direccion del veterano y probado PTC.

articles.title: Exitos logrados en desarrollo de literatura y arte del Juche
articles.content:
Exitos logrados en desarrollo de literatura y arte del Juche
 Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, se lograron los exitos que manifiestan el aspecto de literatura y arte del Juche en los sectores de pelicula, drama y opera de Corea.
					  La pelicula de ficcion "El pais que conoci" (las partes 2 y 3) se creo especialmente al estilo coreano tanto en el caracter ideologico y artistico como en el metodo y estilo de creacion.
					
					  La obra explica profundamente en lo artistico el problema principal de forjar el destino de la nacion.     El filme demuestra que la dignidad y poderio del pais y la nacion no dependen del tamano de territorio y numero de habitantes sino de la audacia y coraje del dirigente que representa la independencia de la nacion y que mantener el espiritu de la independencia es la causa para lograr la victoria.
					
					  Ademas, se creo la pelicula de ficcion "Abedul del Paektu", que describe a una estudiante graduada de la Universidad Kim Il Sung quien trabajando voluntariamente de conferenciante del Lugar de Combate Revolucionario en la zona del monte Paektu tras abandonar la capital, dedica toda su vida a la educacion en las tradiciones revolucionarias del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					  Esta pelicula contribuye a armar a todo el ejercito y el pueblo con el espiritu de defender a costa de la vida al lider.
					
					  La pelicula de ficcion "El naufragio" demuestra vividamente con cuadro artistico que las artimanas de los imperialistas fracasaran sin falta por la lucha de todo el pueblo coreano listo a defender con firmeza el regimen socialita. El filme contribuye a hacer brillar nueva era dorada de desarrollo de la cinematografia autoctona.
					
					  El Conjunto Dramatico Nacional recreo el drama "Centinela bajo la lampara de neon" creada en China a principios de la decada de 1960 como obra  perfecta tanto en vista del contenido ideologico y significacion cognoscitivo-educativa como a la luz de caracter artistico.
					
					  El Conjunto Operistico Mar de Sangre completo magnificamente en alto nivel artistico todos los elementos de la descripcion de la opera "El sueno  en la camara roja" quedando fiel al contenido de la obra original.
					
					 Esta obra es la novela clasica famosa de China y fue adoptada y puesta en la escena en la decada de 1960.
					
					   Ademas, el Conjunto Artistico de la provincia de Kangwon creo la cancion y narracion "Mi esposo se hizo heroe" que demuestra la lucha de las mujeres de la aldea de Kumgang enfrascadas en el apoyo al frente durante la pasada Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					  Las obras dan gran estimulo espiritual al ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.

articles.title: "Sucesos del ano Ulmi" acusan la historia criminal de Japon
articles.content:
"Sucesos del ano Ulmi" acusan la historia criminal de Japon
 Pyongyang, 8 de octubre (ATCC) -- El 8 de octubre de 1895, los bandidescos imperialistas japoneses asaltaron con fusiles y sables el palacio real del Estado feudal de la dinastia de los Ri y asesinaron cruelmente a Minbi, esposa del vigesimo sexto rey Kojong.
					  Con motivo de ese incidente, el diario Rodong Sinmun publico este jueves un articulo individual que senala en particular:
					
					  Ese caso fue registrado en la historia como "Sucesos del ano Ulmi" porque 1895 fue el ano Ulmi segun el calendario anual del pueblo coreano.
					
					  Ese crimen delata a todo el mundo que los imperialistas japoneses son enemigos jurados del pueblo coreano y matones barbaros que no toman en consideracion la ley internacional ni la etica ni la moral.
					
					  El asesinato de Minbi ha sido planeado y ejecutado partiendo de la politica de los imperialistas japoneses para la agresion a Corea.
					
					  Los asesinos japoneses mataron a sangre fria a Minbi, una de las personas que representaban entonces el Poder estatal de Corea, asaltando hasta su dormitorio en el palacio real, lugar sagrado que simboliza a un Estado soberano.
					
					  Esto fue un ilegal acto antietico sin precedente en la historia y el crimen antinacional y antiestatal de gran envergadura que violo de manera organizada y gangsteril la soberania y la dignidad de Corea.
					
					  Paso mas de un siglo desde ese incidente.
					
					  Si bien los reaccionarios japoneses maniobran neciamente hasta la fecha para dejar en el olvido de la historia los verdaderos aspectos de ese crimen, no podran hacerlo de ninguna manera.
					
					  Cada vez que Japon intensifica su maniobra para tergiversar su ensangrentada historia de agresion a Corea en el siglo pasado y eludir su responsabilidad, se hace mas fuerte el odio del pueblo coreano a ese pais isleno.
					
					   Japon debe ver correctamente el sentimiento antijapones y el espiritu de independencia nacional de los coreanos.
					
					  El pueblo coreano saldara la cuenta sin falta, de siglo en siglo, de los crimenes cometidos en el siglo pasado por los imperialistas japoneses contra la nacion coreana.
